Ash Flat, AR 72513

citations.narrative:
The attending veterinarian has not visited the facility in the last 12 months. The last facility visit conducted by the
attending veterinarian was completed on May 6, 2024. Regularly scheduled visits to the facility allow the attending
veterinarian to assess the adequacy of veterinary care and ensure the health and well-being of the dogs. The written
program of veterinary care must include regularly scheduled visits, not less than every 12 months, by the attending
veterinarian to all premises where all animals are kept. The licensee must ensure the attending veterinarian visits the
facility not less than once every 12 months.
Correct by September 12, 2025.

The facility is not following the program of veterinary care which indicates one dog should be tested annually for
heartworm disease. The last heartworm test was completed May 15, 2024. Not performing tests as directed by the
program of veterinary care could lead to undetected problems that can result in illness and infection in the dogs. The
licensee must follow the program of veterinary care in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian
for the sampling and treatment of parasites.
Correct by August 26, 2025.
This inspection and initial exit interview were conducted with the licensee on August 11, 2025. A final verbal exit interview
was conducted with the licensee on August 12, 2025.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(1) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The attending veterinarian has not visited the facility in the last 12 months. The last facility visit conducted by the 
attending veterinarian was completed on May 6, 2024. Regularly scheduled visits to the facility allow the attending 
veterinarian to assess the adequacy of veterinary care and ensure the health and well-being of the dogs. The written 
program of veterinary care must include regularly scheduled visits, not less than every 12 months, by the attending 
veterinarian to all premises where all animals are kept. The licensee must ensure the attending veterinarian visits the 
facility not less than once every 12 months. 
 
Correct by September 12, 2025. 
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility is not following the program of veterinary care which indicates one dog should be tested annually for 
heartworm disease. The last heartworm test was completed May 15, 2024. Not performing tests as directed by the 
program of veterinary care could lead to undetected problems that can result in illness and infection in the dogs. The 
licensee must follow the program of veterinary care in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian 
for the sampling and treatment of parasites. 
 
Correct by August 26, 2025. 
 
This inspection and initial exit interview were conducted with the licensee on August 11, 2025. A final verbal exit interview 
was conducted with the licensee on August 12, 2025.
